definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: garden (cf. foregoing)—[[גַּנׇּה]] Is 1:30, Is 61:11; cstr. [[גִּנַּת]] Ct So 6:11 + 3 t.; sf. [[גַּנׇּתוֹ]] Job 8:16; pl. [[גַּנּׁת]] Nu 24:6, [[גַּנּוֹת]] Ec 2:5 + 6 t.; sf. [[גַּנּוֹתֵיכֶם]] Am 4:9; garden, orchard, Am 4:9 (‖[[כֶּרֶם]], [[תְּאֵנׇה]], [[זַיִת]]), Am 9:14 (fruit-garden; ‖[[כֶּרֶם]]), Je 29:5, Je 29:28, Ec 2:5 (‖[[פַּרְדֵּס]]), [[גִּנַּת אֱגוֹז]] Ct So 6:11 nut-garden; cf. [[גִּנַּת־בִּיתָן]] Es 1:5, Es 7:7, Es 7:8; in simile, of prosperous Isr. Nu 24:6 (poem in JE; [[עֲלַינׇהָר]]´[[ג]]), of chastised Isr. Is 1:30 (´[[אשׁר מים אין לָהּ ג]]), of Yahweh's blessing Is 61:11; in Job 8:16 [[עַל־גַּנּוֹ]] in fig. of prosperity of wicked, as a luxuriant plant; gardens as places of idolatrous worship Is 1:29 (‖[[אֵילִים]]), Is 65:3 (‖[[לְבֵנִים]] ), Is 66:17 (i.e. groves).
